title: BRIEF-Coca-Cola Says CEO James Quincey's 2017 Total Compensation Was $10.6 Million
text: March 8, 2018 / 3:21 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Coca-Cola Says CEO James Quincey's 2017 Total Compensation Was $10.6 Million Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 8 (Reuters) - Coca-Cola Co: * COCA-COLA SAYS CHAIRMAN & FORMER CEO MUHTAR KENT’S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $14.8 MILLION - SEC FILING * COCA-COLA CO - CEO JAMES QUINCEY’S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $10.6 MILLION * COCA-COLA CO SAYS CFO KATHY WALLER‍​'S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $6.4 MILLION VERSUS $7 MILLION IN FY 2016 Source text : ( bit.ly/2FrJXEF ) Further company coverage:
